text: Leposternon kisteumacheri is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 2000 Category:Taxa named by Marcovan Porto Category:Taxa named by Marcelo Araújo Soares Category:Taxa named by Ulisses Caramaschi Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Leposternon kisteumacheri
